name: Realtime Transcription, Inc.
tag_list: transcription, captions, captioning, transcripts, searchable-video, video, real-time, streaming, seo, transendia, transcendia, access, deaf, 508, w3c, sync
overview:
Provides instant access and searchability to the spoken word, through realtime transcription, captioning services and fully searchable video.

Realtime Transcription’s tag line is “Capturing Business at the Speed of Sound.” The company provides streaming realtime transcription for live events such as online meetings, webinars, conferences, classes, live broadcast events, press releases and other time-sensitive events. They also offer transcription of archived audio and video files.

Immediate transcription of video, with time codes, for fast video editing is a specialty of this company, and they provide this service to various media companies.

Through their patent-pending search (SEO) technology, they offer one-click pin-point video search of captioned text. This technology - using their Transendia media player - allows one click from Google or Bing or other search engines on a word or phrase spoken in a video. Clicking on the search result takes the user to that exact spot in the video.

Fully searchable and accessible video examples may be seen at the following URL:
http://transendia.com/examples/

Realtime Transcription has a strong commitment to accessibility, bolstered by the President’s background in working with persons with disabilities and ties to the captioning and hearing loss communities.
